content: angel wings shawl by julee reeves materials approx 16 ounces of yarn of choice size h crochet hook tapestry needle special stitches and abbreviations shell 2dc ch2 2dc in indicated space v-st double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in indicated space space= space make loop magic loop or ch3 slip_stitch in first chain to make loop row 1 ch4 counts as double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet 4 times turn 5- ch1 spaces 6 double_crochet row 2 ch3 double_crochet ch2 2 double_crochet in next ch1 space ch1 v st in next ch1 space ch1 shell in next ch1 space ch1 v st in next ch1 space ch1 2 double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in next ch1 space double_crochet in top of ch3 turn 3-shell 2-v sts 6-ch1 sps including ch1 in v sts row 3 ch3 shell in next ch2 space *ch1 double_crochet in next ch1 space ch1 v st in next v st ch1 double_crochet in next ch1 space ch1 shell in next ch2 space* repeat from *to* double_crochet in top of beg ch3 turn 3- shells 2- v sts 10- ch1 sps including ch1 in v sts row 4 ch3 shell in next ch2 space * ch1 double_crochet in next ch1 space 2 times ch1 v st in next v st ch1 double_crochet in next ch1 space 2 times ch1 shell in next ch2 space* repeat from *to* double_crochet in top of beg ch3 turn 3-shells 2- v sts 14- ch1 sps including ch1 in v sts row 5 ch3 shell in next ch2 space * ch1 double_crochet in each ch1 space to next v st ch1 v st in v st ch1 double_crochet in each ch1 space to next shell ch1 shell in next ch2 space* repeat from *to* double_crochet in top of beg ch3 turn 3- shells 2- v sts 18- ch1 sps including ch1 in v sts repeat row 5 until desired size for edging you ll want to end with an even number of row so shell edge will work out correctly edging ch1 turn single_crochet in first double_crochet 5 double_crochet in shell slip_stitch in next ch1 space * 3 double_crochet in next ch1 space slip_stitch in next ch1 space to v st 5 double_crochet in v st slip_stitch in next ch1 space repeat from to 1 time 7 double_crochet in shell slip_stitch in next ch1 space repeat from to 2 times 5 double_crochet in shell single_crochet in top of beg ch3 fasten_off yarn weave in ends optional if you d like you can single_crochet across the end of the row this pattern is for personal and charity use only please contact me if you are interested in selling the finished product thanks julee julee_reeves@yahoo com
